Key Match Events: The Hornets were down by as many as 18 points in the second half but LaMelo Ball spurred their comeback.
LaMelo Ball poured 12 of his 34 points in the fourth quarter.
Pre-Game Insights: Charles Lee wants to build an identity on the defensive side of the ball.
LaMelo Ball mentioned how important it is to be a two-way player.
Post-Match Reflections: LaMelo Ball said it's great to help coach Lee secure his first win.
Charles Lee described LaMelo Ball as the 'engine' for this team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Hornets continued their home opener win streak with a comeback win against the Houston Rockets.
Charlotte has won its last four season debut games, the longest active streak in the NBA.
Others: The Hornets will continue their road trip with one stop in Atlanta to play the Hawks on Friday before heading back to Charlotte for their home opener against the Miami Heat.
